cards.text: [reaction] свойство этой карты следует читать: «После того как вы успешно исследовали, поверните „Доктора Милана Кристофера“…»

Свойство [action] следует читать: «[action] Потратьте 1 патрон: Бой. У вас +2 [combat] в этой атаке. Если в ходе этой атаки вытянут жетон с неотрицательным модификатором, эта атака наносит +2 раны».
Запрещена.
This card now reads: “Disengage from each enemy engaged with you and move to a connecting location with no enemies.”
This card’s [action] ability gains: “This attack may target a non-[[Elite]] enemy up to one location away from its standard range, ignoring the aloof and retaliate keywords.”
This card loses the text: “Attached asset cannot be used to attack enemies engaged with you.”
This card’s ability gains: “Remove Eucatastrophe from the game.”
This card’s constant ability now reads: “If this card has no charges, remove it from the game.”
This card’s ability gains: “Remove each committed copy of Three Aces from the game.”
This card’s ability gains: “Remove A Watchful Peace from the game.”
This card’s ability gains: “Remove Hallow from the game.”
